column5: Hey everyone,  I was wondering if anyone can stear me in the right direction in terms of a pike and pike fishing book.  I am looking for a book with cool photos and great information about the fish and fishing for it.  I searched this site for it but all that comes up are pike reports, pike reports, and a few more pike reports.  Any information would be greatly appreciated so I could start writing up some half decent pike reports.
pike & muskie fishing techniques from wallmart or canadian tire
